doc.after: Firefighting is the act of extinguishing fires A firefighter suppresses and extinguishes fires to prevent loss of life and or destruction of property and the environment Firefighters may provide many other valuable services to the community they serve such as emergency medical services Firefighting requires professionals of high technical skill who have spent years for training in both general firefighting techniques and specialized areas of expertise Some of the specialized area of fire and rescue operations include Aircraft airport rescue Wildland fire suppression and Search and rescue
